burlap.domain.singleagent.pomdp.tiger

Class TigerDomain.TigerRF

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.domain.singleagent.pomdp.tiger.TigerDomain.TigerRF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RewardFunction
    Enclosing class:
    TigerDomain

    public static class TigerDomain.TigerRF
extends java.lang.Object
implements RewardFunction
    Defines the reward function for the tiger domain, which is defined by four values: opening the correct door with the prize; opening the wrong door with the tiger; listening; and doing nothing. By default these will have the values: 10, -100, -1, 0, respectively.
